name: Pizza Slicer
description:
Pizza Slicer

You're just a lonely slice of pizza trying to get back to the pie that you were cut from. Enemy mouths will try to eat you, so make sure to slide away from them with your greasy crust. Better yet, teach them a lesson by shooting some pepperonis at them. If you get past all the obstacles, you get to be part of an entire pizza again--no more loneliness!

This game is mostly just a prototype at this point. If you liked it even a little bit, let me know in the comments. Maybe I'll keep working on it just for you!
